bot_1_Hi: You can create your own story. What kind of story do you want? For example, I can tell a story about a boy who saw the sea for the first time, or a story about a girl riding a horse
bot_2_Hi: What kind of activity do you want? For example, I can suggest you how to teach sorting to your children in a class
bot_3_Hi: What kind of activity do you want? For example, I can suggest you how you can engage your child to learn about colors
